scripts.build: npx babel src --out-dir lib --copy-files --include-dotfiles --config-file ./.babelrc && react-scripts build
scripts.build-clean: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.test: yarn run clean && yarn run gardener && yarn run test-simple
scripts.it: yarn run i && yarn run t
scripts.start-offline: yarn run build-clean && sls offline start --config serverless/config.js --stack=api-offline --region=${awsRegion} --env=offline
